backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing authorization‑protected user profiles and per‑user video/note bookmark storage using Maps and Sets.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requests to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre‑generated summaries of all frontend source files describing their purpose and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH‑based light/dark theme variables and global background/foreground behavior.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document containing the app mount point and script loader for the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app that defines all routes, loads subject configs, and shows a splash screen before rendering the router.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that logs caught errors and displays a reloadable fallback UI when crashes occur.
frontend/src/components/AppLogo.tsx: Logo component rendering a primary PNG with automatic fallback to a secondary image on load failure.
frontend/src/components/AuthControls.tsx: Authentication control button that handles Internet Identity login/logout and clears client cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Fixed bottom navigation bar with four main tabs highlighting the active route using TanStack Router state.
frontend/src/components/CourseImageCarou: Image carousel that auto-advances slides and provides manual navigation with indicators.
frontend/src/components/DriveViewer.tsx: Displays Google Drive files with an embedded viewer, fallback handling, and offline save support.
frontend/src/components/SoundPlayer.tsx: Simple audio player that auto-plays a sound when triggered and fires an optional end callback.
frontend/src/components/TopicVideoList.t: Scrollable list of topic videos with selectable items and bookmark toggling.
frontend/src/components/YouTubePlayer.ts: Embeds YouTube videos or playlists by converting URLs to proper embed links.
frontend/src/content/exams.ts: Defines configuration for exam sets including IDs, titles, durations, and Google Drive URLs.
frontend/src/content/gk.ts: General Knowledge subject config listing topics and associated YouTube videos and notes.
frontend/src/content/iq.ts: IQ subject config defining multiple test categories with linked YouTube videos.
frontend/src/content/oldQuestions.ts: Data for old exam questions per paper, including years, availability, and Drive URLs.
frontend/src/content/secondPaper.ts: Defines subject configs for office management and constitution, including topics, video lists, and notes URLs.
frontend/src/content/syllabus.ts: Exports a list of syllabus link objects for different provinces and categories, some with coming-soon flags.
frontend/src/content/thirdPaper.ts: Defines service management subject config with multiple topics and associated educational video links.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Manages local and cloud-synced bookmarks for videos and notes, merging and storing data across sessions.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountdownTimer.ts: Provides a countdown timer hook with start, stop, reset, and formatted time output.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for login, identity persistence, and auth-client configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Loads, stores, and updates user notifications with read status tracking in local storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineLibrary.ts: Handles a local offline library of documents, videos, and notes with add and remove operations stored in local storage.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables for light/dark modes, utility animations, and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the dashboard with header, course sections, subject shortcuts, image carousel, and notifications badge.
frontend/src/pages/Exam.tsx: Implements mock exam flow with timer, exam selection, PDF viewer, and completion screen with sound alert.
frontend/src/pages/NotesBookmarks.tsx: Displays bookmarked notes with delete controls and navigation, using stored bookmark state.
frontend/src/pages/Notifications.tsx: Shows categorized notifications and allows marking items as read.
frontend/src/pages/OfflineLibrary.tsx: Lists saved offline items with open and delete actions, or an empty-state message.
frontend/src/pages/OldQuestions.tsx: Renders old question papers with tabbed navigation and opens selected papers in a Drive viewer.
frontend/src/pages/SplashScreen.tsx: Displays a full‑screen animated splash screen with a logo and title before the app loads.
frontend/src/pages/SubjectContent.tsx: Shows subject videos, notes, and search with resizable panels and bookmark support.
frontend/src/pages/Syllabus.tsx: Lists syllabus items and opens selected ones in a Drive viewer, with coming‑soon handling.
frontend/src/pages/VideoBookmarks.tsx: Displays and filters bookmarked videos with options to remove bookmarks.
frontend/src/types/content.ts: Defines interfaces for videos, topics, and subject configuration.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/src/utils/videoSearch.ts: Filters topics and videos by a search keyword, returning only matching items.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom OKLCH color tokens, extended theme settings, animations, and core plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app requirements, architecture notes, issues, image needs, and existing implemented features.
